TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AnnotationHelper extends System.Object
public ref class AnnotationHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供实用工具方法和命令，以创建和删除突出显示的墨迹粘滞便笺及文本粘滞便笺批注。

span.span: Provides utility methods and commands to create and delete highlight, ink sticky note, and text sticky note annotations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ClearHighlightsForSelection (System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService service);
.method public static hidebysig void ClearHighlightsForSelection(class System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService service) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ClearHighlightsForSelection (service As AnnotationService)
public: static void ClearHighlightsForSelection(System::Windows::Annotations::AnnotationService ^ service);

param.name: service
param.span: 从中移除突出显示批注的批注服务。

span.span: The annotation service from which to remove highlight annotations.

summary.span: 从与给定 相关联的查看器控件的当前所选内容中清除所有突出显示批注。

span.span: Clears all highlight annotations from the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前的查看器所选内容的长度为零或不重叠任何批注突出显示，不执行任何操作。If the current viewer selection is zero length or does not overlap any annotation highlights, performs no operation. 如果当前的查看器所选内容仅部分重叠突出显示，清除仅重叠所选内容的一部分，并且未选取的批注突出显示部分保持。If the current viewer selection overlaps a highlight only partially, only the portion of the selection that overlaps is cleared and the unselected portion of the annotation highlight remains.

span.span: is .
is not enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation CreateHighlightForSelection (System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService service, string author, System.Windows.Media.Brush highlightBrush);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation CreateHighlightForSelection(class System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService service, string author, class System.Windows.Media.Brush highlightBrush) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateHighlightForSelection (service As AnnotationService, author As String, highlightBrush As Brush) As Annotation

public: static System::Windows::Annotations::Annotation ^ CreateHighlightForSelection(System::Windows::Annotations::AnnotationService ^ service, System::String ^ author, System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ highlightBrush);

param.name: service
param.span: 用于创建突出显示批注的批注服务。

span.span: The annotation service to use to create the highlight annotation.
The author of the annotation.

param.name: highlightBrush
param.span: 用于对所选内容绘制突出显示的画笔。

span.span: The brush to use to draw the highlight over the selected content.

summary.span: 在与指定 相关联的查看器控件的当前所选内容上创建突出显示批注。

span.span: Creates a highlight annotation on the current selection of the viewer control associated with the specified .

returns.span: 突出显示批注；如果不存在要突出显示的所选内容，则为 。

span.span: The highlight annotation; or , if there is no selected content to highlight.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 突出显示批注定位到定义当前选择的内容， ， ， ，或到指定控件构造函数。The highlight annotation is anchored to the content defined by the current selection of the , , , , or control specified to the constructor. 如果没有选定的内容 （所选内容长度为零长度），会创建任何批注和引发。If there is no selected content (the selection length is zero length), no annotation is created and an is thrown. `author` 可以指定为`null`在这种情况下不定义作者。`author` can be specified as `null` in which case no author is defined. 如果`highlightBrush`是`null`，默认值突出显示的给定批注画笔`service`使用。If `highlightBrush` is `null`, the default highlight brush of the given annotation `service` is used. 给定的批注`service`必须通过调用启用之前调用。The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to prior to calling .

span.span: is .
is not enabled.
-or-
in not a .

exception.span: 查看器控件不包含任何内容选择。

span.span: The viewer control contains no content selection.

param.span: 从中删除墨迹粘滞便笺批注的批注服务。

summary.span: 删除完全包含在与给定 相关联的查看器的当前所选内容内的墨迹粘滞便笺批注。

span.span: Deletes ink sticky note annotations that are wholly contained within the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果与关联的查看器控件不包含用户所选内容或用户选择不完全包含任何墨迹手写便笺批注，不执行任何操作。If the viewer control associated with the contains no user selection or the user selection does not wholly contain any ink sticky note annotations, performs no operation. 给定的批注`service`必须通过调用启用之前调用。The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to prior to calling .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo GetAnchorInfo (System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService service, System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation annotation);

public: static System::Windows::Annotations::IAnchorInfo ^ GetAnchorInfo(System::Windows::Annotations::AnnotationService ^ service, System::Windows::Annotations::Annotation ^ annotation);

param.name: service
param.span: 要用于此操作的批注服务。

span.span: The annotation service to use for this operation.

param.name: annotation
param.span: 要为其获取定位信息的批注。

span.span: The annotation to get anchoring information for.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象提供有关指定批注的定位信息，如定位点位置。

span.span: Returns an object that provides anchoring information, such as the anchor location, about the specified annotation.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象提供有关指定批注的定位信息；如果无法解析指定的批注，则为 。

span.span: An object that provides anchoring information about the specified annotation, or if it cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Examples 请考虑具有注释窗格一个简单的文档读取器应用程序。Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane. 注释窗格可能是一个列表框，用于显示锚定到文档的批注列表的文本。The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document. 如果用户在列表框中选择一项，应用程序将显示相应的批注对象所锚定到的文档段落。If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to. 下面的示例演示如何实现充当注释窗格的此类列表框的事件处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#handler)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#handler)]
